extension.description: In this wizard you will find the latest VitaDome TV Wizard and Tools.

Please note that Gabba-Gool is not affiliated with the Kodi Team and/or their software. This is simply a third-party plugin for use with your current media center. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon. In addition, the author does not host or own any content found within this addon. Please use at your own discretion.[COLOR green] Powered by: The MovieDB Helper[/COLOR]
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for the use of this addon. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon. extension.summary: TheMovieDb Helper - Now With Trakt Support!
extension.description: TheMovieDb Helper provides details about movies, tvshows and actors from TMDb. Users can access a variety of lists from TMDb and Trakt.
extension.news: 2.2.43 - Fix for mostwatched shows/movies not reaching limit[CR]2.2.42 - Fix for unwatched episode counts[CR]2.2.41 - Remove resolveurl to prevent crashing bug and add fixes for fanarttv: Episode artwork plus connection error loop[CR]2.2.39/40 - Add role to label2[CR]2.2.38 - Expand Trakt list limit option[CR]2.2.37 - Add throwaway var to attempt fix for _strptime import bug[CR]2.2.36 - Possible fix for old settings format log spam[CR]2.2.35 - Potential fix for datetime bug in py2[CR]2.2.34 - Fix for plugin failed to play error[CR]2.2.33 - Fix for context menu trakt management of tvshows[CR]2.2.32 - Fix for trakt collection url not resolving to details[CR]2.2.31 - Add option to disable folder creation check[CR]2.2.30 - Reattempt create filepath as possible fix for false failure report[CR]2.2.29 - Only skip TMDbHelper .strm files in local library[CR]2.2.28 - Add options for add to library path[CR]2.2.26/27 - Fixes for add to library[CR]2.2.25 - Formatting future episodes fix[CR]2.2.24 - Browse Trakt Collection[CR]2.2.23 - Add to Kodi Library function[CR]2.2.22 - Player now ignores strm files in local library[CR]2.2.21 - Improvements to In-Progress[CR]2.2.20 - Add option to hide unaired episodes/movies. Format unaired episode/movie labels to red italic[CR]2.2.19 - Additional artwork types from kodilibrary[CR]2.2.18 - Cleanup and clear some empty keys[CR]2.2.17 - Add person kodidb stats to service monitor[CR]2.2.16 - Fix service monitor for people[CR]2.2.14/5 - playmedia param for close dialog[CR]2.2.13 - Extra checks to prevent double adding[CR]2.2.11 - Add Rule improvements to Discover[CR]2.2.10 - Move stats to infoproperties[CR]2.2.9 - DB Stats for Person[CR]2.2.8 - Use select dialog instead of container for discover method[CR]2.2.7 - Add discover select boxes[CR]2.2.6 - Fix for unicode error in add_query params[CR]2.2.5 - Expose discover method for users[CR]2.2.4 - Cleanup for window manager service monitor[CR]2.2.3 - Add close dialog option[CR]2.2.2 - Add Gender Field[CR]2.2.1 - Additional Sets Properties[CR]2.2.0 - Call Auto method for handling extendedinfo experience
